page.title: 17CROSTON CHARACTERS
page.content: {MRS BEAUMONT J.P.}moved to Croston only 7 years ago, but is active in local charities. A J.P. since 1970,she is involved in{Probcare,}which helps re-habilitate those convicted by the courts, and holds parties for children from broken homes. She holds an annual {garden party}for the{Lifeboat Society which is especially important to the old people in Croston, who like to sit in her garden and remember old times. {MRS BEATRICE FAIRCLOUGH}born 1925 in Croston where she has lived almost all her life. On the{Parish Council}she takes keen interest in Croston life: supporting{Croston by-pass,0rmskirk to {Preston Travel Association, WRVS}meals on Wheels &{Friends of Wymott Prison. She is active in the Methodist Church where she has been a Sunday School teacher and a leader of the Ladies Circle for many years.
